text: Moshi madjika ka ni ritoku ga ari, mata seito mo mijikainaraba, kare-ra wa kanarazu anata ni shitagattadearou. Daga kare-ra ni wa, michinori ga (amarini) tōi to omowa reta. Mamonaku, kare-ra wa, arrā ni kakete chikau. `Dekirukotonara, anata gata to issho ni shussei shita nodaga.' Kare-ra wa jibun no tamashī o horobosu monodearu. Arrā wa kare-ra ga, itsuwatte iru koto o shitte ora reru
